Blender and Stronghold think nothing is going to hit them now. BANG...

Tesifier is hit...

Deemos holds Psuedo in the way as usual.

'Don't kill him, I need him!" Deemos yells. He starts retreating. Atma acts
quickly.

"Deemos! Wait! How about you fight me!" Atma calls.

'Don't be stupid." Deemos replies...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 07, 2000 9:41 PM
Subject: Re: Cave on fire!


>
> ::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::
>
> A shot flies by Deemos, barely missing him and hitting a rock, shattering
it.
> Zardus flies into the battle, jetpack burning and guns blazing.
>
> The Alliance commander was holding a plasma launcher in one hand and an
> automatic in the other. He frowns as his shot misses, opening fire on
Deemos
> with both guns.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica growls as Testifier takes the missiles meant for Deemos. Fine,
he
> thinks, if this bot wanted to die, so be it.
>
> Reptilica aims at Testifier, firing two missiles.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing Blender and Stronghold down, Bloodystrike laughs, putting away both
> his guns and taking out a missile launcher. He fires two missiles at
Deemos,
> while DevilDuer shoots his pistol at Blender and Stronghold, just for
thrills.
>
>
>
